reviews.text: Great food! and great service. Adriana was amazingüôè
Love Inca Paisa ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Amazing food! The flavors were delicious, we ordered Bandeja paisa, Pollo a la brasa and we were all satisfied!
Excelente servicio
Esteban was amazing so friendly and talented and making the perfect thing for you
La comida deliciosa, el servicio es excelente, gracias a todos los meseros, muy buen ambiente. Volver√≠a sin duda
Adriana was amazing!! The food and atmosphere was great!!
The red sangria was delicious! It came highly recommended by our server, Adriana, and it did not disappoint!
Everything was fantastic.  Food and service was outstanding. Adriana was exceptional in providing my friend and I with great service throughout our lunch.  Great experience and will return soon.

Had a great time at Inca Paisa with my cousin. They had great music and Sergio was a great server! Food was delicious he was so kind and was constantly checking our table. Thanks so much for the great time.
Great service! And really yummy food. Had a great date night!
Sergio was fantastic and food was delicious
Sergio our waiter was great, and the food was super delicious!
Adriana provided excellent service‚Äîattentive, polite, and friendly throughout the meal. Really made the experience enjoyable
Dead place. Closed before posted hours.
Amazing food w great portions. The vibes were amazing w the live dj! Definitely ask about their happy hour when ordering drinks

My experience was the first time I visited this branch, I had already been to Franklin Lewis, the food was very simple in flavor, we ordered a chicharr√≥n ceviche and they served us a fish ceviche and the breaded chicken was not good, I don't know if it was because we were the last table but I will not return.
Great service, and delicious food. Will definitely recommend!!
Adriana was great!

Fantastic experience! Adriana was absolutely amazing ‚Äî friendly, attentive, and made our meal extra special. The food was delicious, fresh, and perfectly prepared. Overall, excellent service and great atmosphere. Highly recommend!
La comida es espectacular y Sergio, nuestro mesero fu√© excelente. Definitivamente los mejores frijoles de  New York!  Recomendad√≠simo.

Hoy deseaba tener un rato y una cena agradable con mi flia desafortunada mente el servicio fue extremadamente malo de llegada parados en la puerta casi 10 minutos  OjO con mesas vac√≠as fue la ni√±a de la barra qu√© sali√≥ y nos sent√≥ y fue incre√≠ble que pasaron mas de 30 minutos y nisiquiera nos preguntaron quieren agua? Meseros por ning√∫n lado  ok que estaban ocupados pasa pero hubo un momento en el que estaban parados y nada hab√≠a una se√±ora no si era mesera solo estaba doblando servilletas bueno si ese ara su trabajo esta bien pero si no p√≥ngase a trabajar un establecimiento haci la comida sea muy buena sin un buen servicio y atenci√≥n al cliente no vale
Hasta la mesa del al lado con pena ajena le dijo una mesera ellos hace rato estan hay
Mejor decidimos mejor pararnos he irnos lastima por que se que la comida es buena pero no creo que volvamos
Adriana was an amazing waitress very friendly and gave great recommendations
Todo muy Rico!
Great service and food!
Good food and good vibes! üòé Adriana is wonderful to us and nice waitress..
Consistently good food

This is my favorite restaurant in my Astoria neighborhood by far.  The atmosphere is awesome, in large part because of the irresistible Latin music, but also due to the lush decor.  The food is outstanding, novel for me, and generously portioned.  And the meal pictured is gluten-free!  Staff is always welcoming and service just right.  Love this place.
Jaime provided us amazing service  and food was delicious
The food was great and the service was excellent.
buena comida y el trago qu√© eleg√≠ el pisco muy bueno
Recomendado 100%
Service was excellent by Adriana very professional

The manager told one of their staff today to deny entry to an individual with a service animal. The employee relayed that the manager indicated proof must be provided in order to be seated with a service animal. The manager should be educated on the laws within NYC and which questions they‚Äôre allowed to ask the owner of a service animal.
Comida deliciosa, el restaurante muy bonito y con muy buen ambiente. Adriana nos atendi√≥ y nos aconsej√≥ muy bien. Gracias!
Me encanta el lugar, el ambiente es super y Jaime el mejor mesero, su actitud y amabilidad es la mejor.

Thank you Jaime!
The food was delicious and the service phenomenal. My family and I will definitely come back. üíï
Buen servicio por parte del parcero Jaime

Este lugar llam√≥ mucho nuestra atenci√≥n y cuando llegamos todos sus meseros estaban sentados hablando y comiendo no estaban pendiente de sus clientes, la comida no fue muy buena, ped√≠ una margarita y el sabor era p√©simo ped√≠ que me la organizaran por favor e hicieron caso omiso, vieron que no tom√© y a√∫n as√≠ cuando dije que estaba p√©simo el sabor no hicieron el esfuerzo m√≠nimo en ayudar o retirar su bebida ya que no estaba en condiciones para mi, 0 recomendado este lugar y aparte mentirosos 3 meseros sentados y tienen el descaro de decir que solo uno, no cambiaron mi margarita le echaron m√°s trago p√©sima su atenci√≥n los de todos los de este lugar  repito 0 recomendado este lugar no pierdan su tiempo aqu√≠
Todo excelente y delicioso 100% recomendado

Really comfortable, nice place, has parking because is inside the plaza, the combination of Colombian and Peruvian cousins are amazing.
The taste is really good, portion are good, prices are the average
amazing

Super deliciosa la comida
Jaime atendi√≥ genial
It was a great time. Fotos very delicious
Nice
Todo excelente y la atenci√≥n muy buena!
Service was great, Adriana is very nice and kind, food was really good. Pork Rinds Ceviche is awesome, Not expensive at all and reminded me of home.
Adriana  good job !!! **********üíêüç∑
Great food, service and atmosphere
Food and service is always excellent. Thank you to our server Adriana for being attentive and providing great service. I always love coming here.
Adrianna was great

June was a great month to try new places and this name stood up. We came here with family to celebrate father's day. We experienced an early morning brunch. The locatios is kind of small, cozy I would say. The food was good and the atmosphere great. I have to come back here to try more dishes and see if service was improved.

This place was so delicious! No wait for lunch on a weekend. Really fresh seafood and unique dishes + huge portions!! Isabela was a very nice server and explained dishes we hadn‚Äôt heard of before :)

Mi experiencia fue maravillosa gracias a la atenci√≥n de Adriana. Tiene esa amabilidad sincera que transmite confianza y cercan√≠a, lo cual hizo que todo fuera a√∫n m√°s agradable. La comida estuvo riqu√≠sima, pero definitivamente lo que m√°s me hizo disfrutar fue su trato, lleno de cortes√≠a y calidez. Atenciones como la de ella son las que convierten una simple comida en un momento especial que uno quiere repetir.

Came here yesterday for my first time, the Food and drinks were good but my issue was my waiter Stephanie. It was me and my husband who decided to pay them a visit, we get there and immediately was greeted by one of the bartenders and within 2 mins we was already seated, coool. Now the problem comes in when we just sitting there for about 15 to 20 mins before our waiter came to greet us, so she starts asking us what we want and we order. The appetizers came then the food. I had the skirt grilled steak with the white rice and maduros and he had the seafood rice. Delicious!!! But as we almost done I realized everyone had been sat with some chips on their table but we didn‚Äôt get that and that made me feel a lil wayü•∫ I had also asked for a mojito for my meat since it was suppose to come with the chimi sauce but she never gave me that and here comes another server with a mojito drink, places it on the table and walks away so I‚Äôm thinking to myself, WRONG TABLE, but no, my waiter thought I had ordered another drink already still having one of my own on the table she then comes to me and insists that I ordered the mojito drink and now I had to break it down and tell her I‚Äôm Dominican and we call the garlic sauce mojito but not that I needed another drink on my table when I already had mines and he had his. She seemed a bit bothered by the situation which made me feel a way since it was a misunderstanding and deff ain‚Äôt coming out her pocket so it did make me feel like I did something wrong and that‚Äôs NOT OK!!! Now I noticed she‚Äôs literally telling everyone she works with how I‚Äôm Dominican and I ordered a mojito but not a drink which was just rude honestly. We make mistakes and things happen but her as the worker, my server should wanna make me feel welcomed and give me the best dine in experience which she never did but still was charged a 20$ tip which is included in the bill so that was a bummer. Food and drinks were good but I wouldn‚Äôt come back due to her lack of consideration. Everyone else seemed nice, I think it was HER being too comfortable but that‚Äôs not ok to treat people like that.

Overall nice and elegant atmosphere and of course my favorite Peruvian chicken with green sauce. Service was fairly quick with my takeout order.

I stopped in just to get that - a whole chicken. Would come back again for their generous happy hour (M-F 1 to 6 PM). NICE!

I definitely recommend it 130%. Estefani's attentive service, the margaritas she prepares, and the excellent chef are the essential combination for a customer who has just finished a stressful 10-hour workday. I highly recommend it.

Jamie was an excellent server. Food was delicious. They were accommodating with the seating. This is our second time here. My mother loved our first visit so much she insisted celebrating Mother‚Äôs Day here. Thank you for such a great experience. Food was amazing and we will be back again.

We were pleasantly surprised by Inca Paisa for a late night dinner. Friday night was lively with the restaurant being about 80% full at 9pm, but we were still seated quickly upon walking in. There was a live DJ mixing which added to the trendy ambiance and vibe.
The food was reasonably priced (for New York) with a traditional selection of South American dishes. We got steak and ceviche, which included a side of white rice, beans, and fried plantains on the house. The complimentary aji sauces were amazing. The food was nice, the fish in the ceviche was not as fresh as it could have been, but still good! The mixed drinks were also unique and they do not skimp on their pours.
Overall a pleasant experience and I would recommend to others!

I was here on a Sunday evening to celebrate my mother‚Äôs Birthday dinner and we had a pleasant experience.
Let me start by sharing the things we liked about Inca Paisa; there is a parking lot for all the establishments in the area so it was very convenient to park, very nice decor and aesthetic, good ambiance, each one of us enjoyed the food we ordered; we thought portions were fair as well as pricing and the waitresses and waiter were all kind to us.
Things we did not like very much; food had a long wait to come out, we had to ask for water several times, napkins and more utensils so these are customer service points that can definitely improve, the bathroom could also be so much cleaner.
In conclusion, we enjoyed the time we spent here as a family, although the food was good & our experience was positive, I didn‚Äôt feel it stood out enough to make me want to explore other options on their menu.

Came out of the airport and this is the hottest spot near ! What an amazing Latino vibes ! Seat on the bar ‚Ä¶ nice perfectly done ! Food I asked for super picada for two wow that was actually for 4 or 5 !!! I definitely coming back thanks to Antonia for been so attentive and make the best drinks

Absolutely amazing experience!
From start to finish, everything was perfect. The food was delicious, the drinks were top-notch, and the service was outstanding. Our waitress Alejandra took such great care of us‚Äîshe was friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed. Highly recommend this place for a great night out. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

Everything we ate and drank here was delicious. Our favorites were the empanadas de Carne, pisco sours, chicharones y arroz paisa Ranchero, the dessert almojabana and the coffees, so delicious. Stephanie was very hospitable and knowledgeable and kind and made our experience so wonderful. We will come back. Thank you!
Me encant√≥. Un lugar con comida deliciosa, buena m√∫sica, un buen servicio y buenos drinks. Luc√≠a estuvo pendiente de nosotros toda la tarde.

We had ceviche mixto and entra√±a and both were delicious. The ceviche was perfectly acidic and the entra√±a cooked to our asking. Our waiter was named Sergio and he was very attentive and friendly during our whole meal. When we came there was a Dj in the front and the music was great! Would recommend for a quick date night

By far the best bandeja paisa I‚Äôve had in NYC. I‚Äôve been here multiple times and every time the food, service and vibe is as consistent as it gets. The service is great, Sergio our server was very welcoming and attentive to whenever we needed something. Honestly, Inca Paisa is top tier!
One often the best Peruvian restaurants I have experienced in a long time! I will definitely be retuning .

La verdad que este lugar me Encant√≥, es uno de mis favoritos en estos momentos, lo recomiendo todos sus tragos y comida son exquisitas, lo recomiendo mucho, y Antonia muchas gracias por tus servicios muy amable y a pesar que estaba full se tom√≥ el tiempo de tratarme muy bien. Gracias de verdad.

The Lunch Special is a Great Bargin at Inca Paisa. Our server Adriana, was very attentive.
The pitcher of Red Sangria was great.

Food was very tasty - ranchero fried rice with plantains and chicharrones. Waitress was also pleasant. Music/DJ was lively and decor festive and enhanced the ambiance.
However, there was no check  in to see how my friend and I were doing during our dinner, and the host did not greet us when we entered the restaurant nor warmly when we were seated. Appreciate improved service going forward. Thank you

First time coming here with friends and this place is amazing! Food was delicious and had a very good atmosphere. Sergio is such a pleasant person, checking up on us and giving us suggestions on what to pick for food. I would definitely come back for more!

My family and I ordered family style. The James Peruana, entire chicken, loom saltado, and the tres leches.

Came out to $167.55 for 7 people. Everything was solid, however we recommend skipping the lomo saltado.

The food here did NOT disappoint!
We enjoyed the bandeja paisa and I forgot the other dish we got but both were so delicious and flavorful.
We went for happy hour as well and the drinks were roughly 7 dollars each which was perfect because they were heavy drinks!
Overall, our experience here was very comforting and we will absolutely be back!

First visit to Inca Paisa and we were not disappointed. Great music, DELICIOUS FOOD, great service and clean. Mini empanadas, delicious, shrimp avocado, delicious, rice, delicious. Seriously every dish we had we enjoyed. The service from Jaime was exceptional. Super friendly, patient and informative. Thanks for the great experience and food. Highly recommended.

Sergio was absolutely fantastic! From the moment we sat down, he made us feel welcome and taken care of. He was friendly, attentive, and had great recommendations from the menu. Our drinks were never empty, and everything came out perfectly timed. You can tell he really cares about providing a great experience. Definitely ask for Sergio if you visit!
The place it‚Äôs small, good decor the food took long time, the food taste was good, the service good too

Fui un Domingo y la atencion estaba muy lenta avia una sola senorita atendiendo y  avia bastantes clientes,  un poco despistada, tomo las ordenes en su mente  primeros nos sirvio bebidas equivocadas y cuando nos sirvio la comida faltaban platos de comida que pedimos se dispuso a prepararnosla pero ya estabamos ahi como 40 minutos , la carne estaba exquisita ahi platos muy buenos pero unas sopas de pollo que pedimos estaban muy saladas, deberia poner mas meser@s para mejor atenci√≥n...
Excelente restaurante, muy rico y agradable!
A mixture of both Colombian and Peruvian culinary art. Had the lomo de pollo with 6 empanadas de pollo, it was such a delight. My lady and I really enjoyed ourselves as always.

Food was AMAZING. Huge portions and good prices. Our waitress Paola was super kind, sweet, and attentive. We‚Äôll definitely be back! Only minor suggestion is that the music was a little too loud (don‚Äôt go on a Friday night date if you plan on actually talking). They had a DJ which was cool.

High on list!??   Server not a friendly camper:-(.  Very pretty though!??
No hello no specials no chips or bread
But she gave another couple chips and a dip? Friends.  The Shrimp Scampi had no garlic taste and the tiny shrimp medium to small. 38.00.  The one beer was great!!

My new favorite spot! I went there yesterday for the first time by my self and was blown away by the food and service. I sat at the bar and ordered the lomo saltado and a strong margarita. I was immediately greeted with warmth from the bartender who promptly brought me the most delightful plantain chips and dipping sauce which I am still thinking about today. She then presented me with a lovely margarita with extra salt like I like. I‚Äôm convinced she may have been reading my mind. I had such a nice time by myself and loved the entire experience. Definitely recommend going there if you‚Äôre in the area. Get a drink from the mind reading bartender and order plenty off the menu.

Loved everything about the place. The food was 10/10 and the drinks, well you already know. It‚Äôs a friendly and welcoming atmosphere. Recommend 100%. Our server Isabella made sure we were well taken care of!!!!!! Will definitely come back!!!!!

Excelente comida y sus precios muy razonables
Un men√∫ muy variado, interesante y lo m√°s importante DELICIOSO!!!!!
Jaime nos prest√≥ un servicio genial, muy atento y amable
Volveremos sin pensarlo
100% recomendado
Mi mam√° feliz con su shot de coquito üòÅ
When you‚Äôre welcomed with house wine and plantain chips you know it‚Äôs going to be a good place. Great fast service and many options on the menu including vegan/vegetarian friendly.
La comida deliciosa, el servicio excelente. Todo fresco, verdaderamente sabroso, y los precios imbatibles. No puedo recomendarlo lo suficiente. Volver√©

Upon entering we were sat in a table by the glass looking outside. We asked for a high chair for my 2 year old. About 10 min later no high chair. A male waiter came and I asked him for the high chair, he went to the back and came back to tell us they didn‚Äôt have anymore available. The whole restaurant only has 2 since there were only 2 being used. I was already annoyed at this but proceeded to order. In the meantime we asked the male waiter if we could switch our table because the sun was very strong. He gave us a table in the back, a lot better! Appetizer came and it was delicious, then the food came and we loved everything. The food and our waiter were a total game changer. He was super nice and polite!

Pros- food, atmosphere, service
Cons-not enough high chairs, and no toddler changing mat in bathroom

La comida es super fresca y deliciosa. La atencion es excelente. Les recomiendo pregunte men por Jaime. Platos recomendados: Ceviches, Arroz de Mariscos y Cazuela de Mariscos. Las mini empanaditas tambien son deliciosas. 100% Recomendado‚Ä¶
La comida 10/10 me encant√≥ y los tragos ni que hablas son dms ricos lo recomiendo , el servicio me gust√≥ mucho el joven Sergio nos atendi√≥ muy bien

My parents and I came here for my dad‚Äôs birthday, and I can‚Äôt be more glad we did!
The food was delicious, the music and the environment were very welcoming to say the least.  The best part of our evening was Jaime‚Äôs outstanding costumer service. He was very kind and attentive. Thank you!!!!!

The menu is excellent and the pictures on it look amazing but I was a little disappointed that the chicharron was overcooked and the rice and beans didn't have much flavor.
Plenty of parking and prices are on the high side like everywhere else.
Top class service and the best peruvian - colombian fusion food ! Very fresh and tasty ! I recommend every dish on this menu üôåüèº There cocktails are on point !
Beautiful restaurant with different food choices, from vegetarian to meat lovers! We had two sangria, chicharon ceviche and stake for $69. 00.

listen i think this is a good place but the rating is inflated bc they do get free dessert for 5 stars. like the tigers milk ceviche was decent. it was very sour but not milky enough. the music is also very loud and there‚Äôs a live dj so this is place to bring friends and have a good time and vibe.
Great value and tasty food! Worth a try plus they have 7$ happy hour drinks. Adrianna is the best server running a very busy lunch
Jaime was a wonderful server!! And food..!!! Perfect!!üëåüèª
